content.query:
-- ****** [ACTION REQUIRED] ******
--Step 1: Create master key for the database
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.symmetric_keys WHERE name LIKE '%DatabaseMasterKey%')
	CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'strong' -- Enter a strong password
GO

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.database_credentials WHERE name = 'SynapseManagedIdentity')
	CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [SynapseManagedIdentity] WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
Go

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'todayscontainer_todaysprivate_dfs_core_windows_net_ManagedIdentity') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [todayscontainer_todaysprivate_dfs_core_windows_net_ManagedIdentity] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://todaysprivate.dfs.core.windows.net/todayscontainer', 
		CREDENTIAL = SynapseManagedIdentity 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE external_again (
	[_c0] varchar(8000),
	[_c1] varchar(8000),
	[_c2] varchar(8000),
	[_c3] varchar(8000),
	[_c4] varchar(8000),
	[_c5] varchar(8000),
	[_c6] varchar(8000),
	[_c7] varchar(8000),
	[_c8] varchar(8000),
	[_c9] varchar(8000),
	[_c10] varchar(8000),
	[_c11] varchar(8000),
	[_c12] varchar(8000),
	[_c13] varchar(8000),
	[_c14] varchar(8000),
	[_c15] varchar(8000),
	[_c16] varchar(8000),
	[_c17] varchar(8000),
	[_c18] varchar(8000),
	[_c19] varchar(8000),
	[_c20] varchar(8000),
	[_c21] varchar(8000),
	[_c22] varchar(8000),
	[_c23] varchar(8000),
	[_c24] varchar(8000),
	[_c25] varchar(8000),
	[_c26] varchar(8000),
	[_c27] varchar(8000),
	[_c28] varchar(8000),
	[_c29] varchar(8000),
	[_c30] varchar(8000),
	[_c31] varchar(8000),
	[_c32] varchar(8000),
	[_c33] varchar(8000),
	[_c34] varchar(8000),
	[_c35] varchar(8000),
	[_c36] varchar(8000),
	[_c37] varchar(8000),
	[_c38] varchar(8000),
	[_c39] varchar(8000),
	[_c40] varchar(8000),
	[_c41] varchar(8000),
	[_c42] varchar(8000),
	[_c43] varchar(8000),
	[_c44] varchar(8000),
	[_c45] varchar(8000),
	[_c46] varchar(8000),
	[_c47] varchar(8000),
	[_c48] varchar(8000),
	[_c49] varchar(8000),
	[_c50] varchar(8000),
	[_c51] varchar(8000),
	[_c52] varchar(8000),
	[_c53] varchar(8000),
	[_c54] varchar(8000),
	[_c55] varchar(8000),
	[_c56] varchar(8000),
	[_c57] varchar(8000),
	[_c58] varchar(8000),
	[_c59] varchar(8000),
	[_c60] varchar(8000),
	[_c61] varchar(8000),
	[_c62] varchar(8000),
	[_c63] varchar(8000),
	[_c64] varchar(8000),
	[_c65] varchar(8000),
	[_c66] varchar(8000),
	[_c67] varchar(8000),
	[_c68] varchar(8000),
	[_c69] varchar(8000),
	[_c70] varchar(8000),
	[_c71] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'user/trusted-service-user/orderhistory_parquet/part-00000-a5e7f8cd-2181-4c0a-aac2-5be47adf26d5-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [todayscontainer_todaysprivate_dfs_core_windows_net_ManagedIdentity],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM external_again
GO
